bug.description:
When I used these two game_variables (i.e., HITCOUNT and HITS_TAKEN), it got warning as follows, <denchmark-code>WARNING! Loading config from "...cfg". Unsupported value in lines **-**: hitcount. BTW, my cfg file includes, <denchmark-code>available_game_variables = { HITCOUNT HITS_TAKEN HEALTH SELECTED_WEAPON_AMMO } </denchmark-code>
